Run loopmodel.

```xml
<LoopmodelWrapper name="(&string;)" loops_file="(&string;)" fast="(&bool;)" />
```

-   **loops_file**: Name of a loop file.
-   **fast**: Run fewer cycles. E.g. for testing.
